triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Foundational paradigm for the paper's work on off-policy learning without exploration.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Core technique that the paper extends with batch-constrained algorithms for fixed batch settings.

triples.name: Q-learning
triples.relevance: Foundational off-policy algorithm that inspired DQN, which the paper analyzes and extends.

triples.name: DQN
triples.relevance: Deep Q-network algorithm that the paper identifies as ineffective for fixed batch learning due to extrapolation errors.

triples.name: Actor-critic algorithm
triples.relevance: Family of algorithms that includes DDPG, which the paper analyzes for off-policy batch learning.

triples.name: Batch learning
triples.relevance: Core concept addressing fixed batch data learning without further data collection opportunities.

triples.name: Batch-constrained reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Novel class of off-policy algorithms proposed in this paper that restricts action space to force agents toward on-policy behavior with fixed batch data.
